data.text:
Follow the adventures of Maya the bee, the little bee who lives in the meadow. With her friends Willy, Flip the grasshopper and all the others, they discover the wonders of nature but also all its dangers. One thing is sure: with Maya, there's never going to be a dull moment!

Stories adapted by Aparna Mazumdar with the voice of Bruce Sherfield.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DISO is the first youth podcast channel that offers funny, heartwarming and mischievous stories for children aged 3 to 9.

All your kids' favorite heroes in audio stories on DISO! Super Wings, Monsters and Magical Creatures, Leo The Truck, The Little Baddies, Zig et Sharko and many more... find them all on DISO. DISO also features new content and characters throughout the year that your kids will love!

Written especially for children, performed by professional actors, and enriched with an immersive sound design, DISO podcasts will take your little ones on a journey through fun and captivating realms!

To listen to these stories, subscribe to DISO (in English) on Apple Podcasts for only 3,99 $US / 3,49 Â£GB per month (or 37,99 $US / 32,99 Â£GB per year, equating to two months free). You can unsubscribe at any time and the first 7 days are free. The first episode of each series is available for free - so you can try before you buy!

DISO is now available in French and Spanish! These two new channels are available on Apple Podcasts - simply type âDISO (en franÃ§ais)â and/or âDISO (en EspaÃ±ol)â in the platform's search bar.

Enjoy!

The DISO team
